Description: IBANEZ RG370DX. Like new condition. No scratches or dings. Low action. Plays beautifuly. Comes with original box and tremelo bar. Tear It Up with a Genuine RGThe Ibanez RG370DX solidbody electric guitar is purpose-built for high-speed, low-drag shredding! It all starts with the RG body style, which is primed for players with attitude. The RG370DX also gives you a fast-playing 3-piece maple Wizard III neck and a resonant, well-balanced basswood body. You'll love how this guitar feels as soon as you pick it up. Turn up the heat, with this guitar's outstanding 3-pickup configuration. It sports two hot humbuckers, with a single-coil pickup in the middle. Get your hands on an Ibanez RG370DX and prepare to shred!Ibanez RG370DX Solidbody Electric Guitar at a Glance:Classic RG performanceEdge Zero II tremoloBig tonal rangeClassic RG performanceThe Ibanez RG-series of guitars has remained a standard in rock music for the last couple of decades, thanks to the effortless playability of its Wizard III neck. You also get a ton of tone, and scorching hot looks to boot!Edge Zero II vibratoThe Ibanez RG370DX sports the Edge Zero II vibrato bridge, which features Ibanez's ZPS3Fe spring design for maximum stability. The result? You can divebomb 'til the cows come home, and still stay in tune.Big tonal rangeWith two humbucking pickups and one single coil, plus five-way switching, you'll be able to shape your tone any way you like on the RG370DX. Although it will forever be known as a rock guitar, the RG370DX's fast playability and tonal variety make it a great guitar for almost any style.Ibanez RG370DX Solidbody Electric Guitar Features:Comfortable, resonant basswood bodyFast 3-piece maple Wizard III neck, rosewood fingerboard with 24 jumbo frets and Sharktooth inlaysEdge Zero II Bridge with ZPS3Fe spring systemNeck pickup: INF3 humbuckerMiddle pickup: INFS3 single-coilBridge Pickup: INF4 humbuckerRock like you mean it, with the Ibanez RG370DX
Title: Ibanez RG370DX Mint Condition!
